en:
Subject: Quantum Heart.
Developed by: Awesome & Likely to Break the Fabric of Spacetime Innovations.

Usage: Entangles the user to a parallel
eigen entity existing on another plane of
reality.

This quantum entanglement causes the
entangled partner to mimic the user's
movement, and vice versa.

The entanglement can be broken by using an
ability, causing the user to quantum tunnel
to the entangled entity's position.

<s>USE WITH CAUTION!!</s>
We all exist in the same spacetime, so
please don't break it, alright?
